headline: Mastercard and Ericsson Partner to Expand Global Digital Payment Capabilities
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is included among the 14 Best Warren Buffett Dividend Stocks to Buy. On February 18, Ericsson and Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) announced a new partnership aimed at improving how money moves around the world. The companies will integrate the Ericsson Fintech Platform, which supports mobile financial services, with Mastercard Move, Mastercard’s global money […]
